title: Does changing my google account password prevent Find My Device from working?
content: I believe my phone was stolen last night. I was trying to use Find My Device to lock and or erase data from my phone, but it hasn't been online since the incident. Since I did change my Google account password used on the phone and knowing changing the password logs you out of your account, does this also mean Find My Device will not locate my phone even if it's turned on?
